au.edu.federation.caliko.utils

Class Utils

  • java.lang.Object
    • au.edu.federation.caliko.utils.Utils

  • public class Utils
extends Object
    Class : A series of static utility / helper methods to perform common operations. Version: 0.4 Date : 04/12/2015

      • random

        public static Random random
        A Random object used to generate random numbers in the randRange methods.

        If you want a reproducable sequence of events, then set a seed value using Utils.setRandomSeed(someValue).

        See Also:
        setRandomSeed(int), randRange(float, float), randRange(int, int)

      • MAX_NAME_LENGTH

        public static int MAX_NAME_LENGTH
        The maximum length in characters of any names which may be used for bones, chains or structures.

    • Method Detail

      • setRandomSeed

        public void setRandomSeed(int seedValue)
        Set a fixed seed value - call this with any value before starting the inverse kinematics runs to get a repeatable sequence of events.
        Parameters:
        seedValue - The seed value to set.

      • randRange

        public static float randRange(float min,
                              float max)
        Return a random floating point value between the half-open range [min..max).

        This means that, for example, a call to randRange(-5.0f, 5.0f) may return a value between -5.0f up to a maximum of 4.999999f.

        Parameters:
        min - The minimum value
        max - The maximum value
        Returns:
        A random float within the specified half-open range.

      • randRange

        public static int randRange(int min,
                            int max)
        Return a random integer value between the half-open range (min..max]

        This means that, for example, a call to randRange(-5, 5) will return a value between -5 up to a maximum of 4.

        Parameters:
        min - The minimum value
        max - The maximum value
        Returns:
        A random int within the specified half-open range.

      • cot

        public static float cot(float angleRads)
        Return the co-tangent of an angle specified in radians.
        Parameters:
        angleRads - The angle specified in radians to return the co-tangent of.
        Returns:
        The co-tangent of the specified angle.

      • sign

        public static float sign(float value)
        Determine the sign of a float value.
        Parameters:
        value - The value to return the sign of.
        Returns:
        1.0f if the provided float value is positive, -1.0f otherwise.

      • setSeed

        public static void setSeed(int seed)
        Method to set a provided seed value to be used for random number generation.

        This allows you to have a repoducable sequence of pseudo-random numbers which are used by the visualisation MovingTarget class.

        Parameters:
        seed - The seed value

      • validateDirectionUV

        public static void validateDirectionUV(Vec2f directionUV)
        Validate a direction unit vector (Vec2f) to ensure that it does not have a magnitude of zero.

        If the direction unit vector has a magnitude of zero then an IllegalArgumentException is thrown.

        Parameters:
        directionUV - The direction unit vector to validate

      • validateDirectionUV

        public static void validateDirectionUV(Vec3f directionUV)
        Validate a direction unit vector (Vec3f) to ensure that it does not have a magnitude of zero.

        If the direction unit vector has a magnitude of zero then an IllegalArgumentException is thrown.

        Parameters:
        directionUV - The direction unit vector to validate

      • validateLength

        public static void validateLength(float length)
        Validate the length of a bone to ensure that it's a positive value.

        If the provided bone length is not greater than zero then an IllegalArgumentException is thrown.

        Parameters:
        length - The length value to validate.

      • convertRange

        public static float convertRange(float origValue,
                                 float origMin,
                                 float origMax,
                                 float newMin,
                                 float newMax)
        Convert a value in one range into a value in another range.

        If the original range is approximately zero then the returned value is the average value of the new range, that is: (newMin + newMax) / 2.0f

        Parameters:
        origValue - The original value in the original range.
        origMin - The minimum value in the original range.
        origMax - The maximum value in the original range.
        newMin - The new range's minimum value.
        newMax - The new range's maximum value.
        Returns:
        The original value converted into the new range.

      • approximatelyEquals

        public static boolean approximatelyEquals(float a,
                                          float b,
                                          float tolerance)
        Return a boolean indicating whether a float approximately equals another to within a given tolerance.
        Parameters:
        a - The first value
        b - The second value
        tolerance - The difference within the a and b values must be within to be considered approximately equal.
        Returns:
        Whether the a and b values are approximately equal or not.

      • validateLineWidth

        public static void validateLineWidth(float lineWidth)
        Ensure we have a legal line width with which to draw.

        Valid line widths are between 1.0f and 32.0f pixels inclusive.

        Line widths outside this range will cause an IllegalArgumentException to be thrown.

        Parameters:
        lineWidth - The width of the line we are validating.

      • getValidatedName

        public static String getValidatedName(String name)
        Return the given name capped at 100 characters, if necessary.
        Parameters:
        name - The name to validate.
        Returns:
        The given name capped at 100 characters, if necessary.
